course_description: Prerequisites: Arabic 202 or permission of instructor. Fifth in a series of courses that develop reading, speaking, listening, writing, and cultural skills in Arabic. Course includes video materials and stresses communication in formal and spoken Arabic.
sections: Class Nbr: 3241, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: R. Cornell, Status: Open
